admin.restartDescription: Triggers a clean server restart via process.exit(0). Replit will automatically restart the service within 5-10 seconds.

admin.behavior1: Server receives restart command and shuts down cleanly
admin.behavior2: Replit automatically restarts the application (5-10 seconds)
admin.behavior3: Service reconnects to production mainnet at tburn1.replit.app
admin.behavior4: Fresh data polling begins, block production resumes
admin.behavior5: Status changes from PAUSED â†’ ACTIVE, TPS normalizes
admin.recoveryDescription: Service restart: 5-10 seconds (automatic) | Data sync: 10-20 seconds | Full recovery: 30-60 seconds total. Monitor the "Last Block" and "Current TPS" metrics above to confirm successful restart.
admin.restartAction3: Reconnect to mainnet and resume data polling
admin.passwordAuthHint: Enter your admin password to authorize this operation.
admin.healthCheckIntro: Perform a comprehensive health check on the TBURN mainnet infrastructure.
admin.restartInitiatedDesc: Server is restarting. Progress will be tracked automatically.
admin.restartFailedDesc: Failed to restart mainnet. Check server logs.
